message: Using latest is prone to errors if the image will ever update. Pin the version explicitly to a release tag
Delete the apt-get lists after installing something
Do not use apt as it is meant to be a end-user tool, use apt-get or apt-cache instead
Pin versions in pip. Instead of `pip install <package>` use `pip install <package>==<version>` or `pip install --requirement <requirements file>`
Avoid use of cache directory with pip. Use `pip install --no-cache-dir <package>`
Pin versions in npm. Instead of `npm install <package>` use `npm install <package>@<version>`
